room_title: Escape room "Titanic" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: My family & I had so much fun doing the Titanic themed room today. We made it out with just 30 seconds to spare. Taylor...our guide was fantastic! The place even has a bar & lockers for your belongings.

room_title: Escape room "Titanic" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: Did the Titanic. Hard going but well worth it. Had a great time. Well organized and v good staff. Would go again.

room_title: Escape room "Titanic" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: I arranged this for my sister's 50th birthday. I loved the ambiance and the decor, very classy. We were in the titanic room, very challenging. We didn't make it out in time, but we were able to find all the clues with help. Staff were very friendly and answered all our questions. Loved the photo op and debrief after. Loved my first escape room experience and my sister and friends had a great time.

room_title: Escape room "Titanic" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: Had an awesome time! Staff was very friendly and the Titanic room was a well put together with a few convincing red herrings.

room_title: Escape room "Titanic" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: My daughter hosted a 16th Birthday Party in the Titanic Room at the Georgetown location. We could not have been happier from start to finish! The staff was welcoming to all - and the facility was spacious and beautiful. The girls remained excited and engaged throughout their "voyage" - and were quite challenged by the experience. My husband and I were able to relax with a beverage in the lounge while the girls tried to escape; it was a fabulous experience for all!
